meanings: (여럿 가운데서) distinguish[differentiate] (A from B), make a distinction (between A and B)
(음식 등을) be choosy, be fussy (about), (informal) be picky (about)
(보이지 않도록) hide, cover, (formal) conceal, screen (sth from sth), obscure, (보호하다) shield

vlive.korean: [아무 이유없음] [상표 가린 용도임] - 오! - 오! - 오어!! [No reason] [To cover the brand] - Wow. - Oh! - Wow! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.17 노래방탈출 #1 (Escape Singing Room #1)
vlive.english: [No reason] [To cover the brand] - Wow. - Oh! - Wow!

vlive.korean: [급하게 가린 핑머] [다 보여줘놓고 스포라고 가린 귀염둥 잘 어울린다고 하니깐] 누군데? [He tries to cover it thinking it's a spoiler] Who is it? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 콜드브루요? 요즘은 골드브루 아닌가요? (NCT DREAM talking about RUNJUN’s episode)
vlive.english: [He tries to cover it thinking it's a spoiler] Who is it?

vlive.korean: 눈 한쪽 가린 거 인정해주나? - 한쪽 가렸어 한쪽 가리면... Does that count? - If it's covered... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.66
vlive.english: Does that count? - If it's covered...

vlive.korean: 웃는 게 아니고 입 가린 거 였군요. It's not laughing, but it was covering the mouth. 듣기 View video KARD : KARD OUT HERE SENDING LOVE FROM BOLIVIA<3
vlive.english: It's not laughing, but it was covering the mouth.

vlive.korean: [눈 가린 승민이를 도와주는 릭스] - 오케이 준비하고 - 화이팅! Okay, get ready. - Fighting! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 3등팀은 없는 슼둥이들의 과녁게임🎯(Stray Kids playing target games)

examples.korean: One painting was of a beautiful, naked woman with only a little foliage covering the appropriate areas. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전시된 그 림중에는 나뭇잎 몇 개로 가릴 곳만 가린 아름다운 여인의 나체 그림이 있었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
